0.9.name: wordpress/mailing-list-builder
0.9.description:
Development and support for this plugin have been discontinued. For great alternatives, check out this guide on the best WordPress mailing list subscription form plugin.

Build a huge list. This plugin allows you to effortlessly and rapidly build a segmented and targeted list of subscribers. You need a GetResponse account to use it, however.

Easy, Yet Extremely Targeted Subscription Forms

This plugin allows you to easily insert GetResponse subscription forms into your WordPress content. You simply type in [mlb /]. But you can also specify a Call to Action by doing [mlb]Subscribe to Receive More Cool Articles About This Topic[/mlb]. You can see a live example here.

The Plugin Will Automatic
